meanings.definition: Having a sharply strong taste or smell.
meanings.sent1: The chili pepper had a pungent flavor that made my eyes water.
meanings.sent2: The cheese emitted a pungent odor that filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The pungent smell of the onions made everyone in the kitchen tear up.
meanings.sent4: The pungent aroma of the coffee beans woke me up instantly.
meanings.sent5: The pungent taste of the vinegar lingered on my tongue for hours.

meanings.definition: Sharply affecting the organs of taste or smell, as if by a penetrating power.
meanings.sent1: The pungent spices in the curry dish made my mouth tingle.
meanings.sent2: The pungent scent of the flowers attracted bees from afar.
meanings.sent3: The pungent flavor of the medicine made the child scrunch up his face.
meanings.sent4: The pungent aroma of the perfume filled the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The pungent taste of the lemon juice made my lips pucker.
